name: Node.js API Development
description: RESTful API and backend services with Node.js
rules: Use Express or Fastify for HTTP server framework
Implement proper error handling middleware with try-catch async wrappers
Always validate request body/params with Zod, Joi, or class-validator
Use environment variables for all configuration, never hardcode secrets
Implement rate limiting and request throttling for public endpoints
Use async/await instead of callbacks or raw promises
Structure code with controllers, services, and repositories pattern
Implement proper logging with structured JSON logs (Winston, Pino)
Use dependency injection for better testability
Always return consistent error response format with status codes
